original_text: Amos was one of the shepherds who lived in the town of Tekoa. God spoke to him. He showed Amos the things that would happen to the people of Israel. God did that two years before the earthquake came. It was during the time that Uzziah was the king of Judah, and Joash's son, Jeroboam, was the king of Israel. This book tells about the message that Amos received from God.
korean_text: 유다 왕 웃시야의 시대 곧 이스라엘 왕 요아스의 아들 여로보암의 시대 지진 전 이년에 드고아 목자 중 아모스가 이스라엘에 대하여 이상으로 받은 말씀이라

sentences.original_text: Amos was one of the shepherds
who lived in the town of Tekoa
that would happen to the people of Israel
God did that two years before the earthquake came
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 지진이 오기 2년 전에 그렇게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: that Uzziah was the king of Judah
and Joash's son, Jeroboam, was the king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요아스의 아들 여로보암이 이스라엘의 왕이었다

sentences.original_text: This book tells about the message
sentences.korean_translation: 이 책은 그 메시지에 대해 이야기한다
